ComicInfo.Title: The Alien; Reapers; Part Two: Terminus; Part One: Advent; Theory of Alien Propagation
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Alien: The President deals with the aftermath of the Alien invasion of Earth and Ripley's use of nuclear weapons to remove most of the Aliens.
Reapers: Another race of aliens encounter the Aliens for the first time.
Part Two: Terminus: Posada escapes the pyramid that was infested by Aliens only to find that he can't leave the planet.
Part One: Advent: Wellington Frick and his small band begin to investigate a pyramid on an isolated world.
Theory of Alien Propagation: An overview of Alien life and their place in the galactic eco-system.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 14:30:58. [CVDB119265] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:31:53. [Issue ID 264672]
